alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla and southeastern Leon Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Florida A And M to near Crawfordville to 17 miles north of Carrabelle. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Natural Bridge, Belair, Hyde Park and Arran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
